txt.en: 'Drive fear into your enemiesâ€™ hearts! With fear you can defeat them without even drawing your sword.'
'With a heavy enough sword and enough strength, no armour can maintain. With a large enough force no fortress can endure.'
'Throw yourself at your enemy, press him. A retreating enemy is an enemy defeated.'
'Attack with your spirit as well as your sword! Fighting without emotion is like living without breathing!'
